p: Noteworthy, the administration scheme of LCO, described in Figure 4a, induced a 55% inhibition in tumor volume in the DA3 breast adenocarcinoma model. In specific, 7 days post cancer cellsâ€™ inoculation, control animals developed tumors of an average size of 377 mm 3, while LCO-treated animals developed tumors of an average size of 170 mm 3. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first report on the antitumor potential of orally administered LCO.
